title: Ticket #407: condor_stats should reject mutually exclusive "query type" options
description: condor_stats accepts one and only one "query type", where the options are -resourcelist, -resourcequery, -resgrouplist, -resgroupquery, -userlist, -userquery, -usergrouplist, -usergroupquery, g-ckptlist, -ckptquery. At the moment it lets you enter as many as you like, and only the last one is considered. Ideally if you specify two or more, condor_stats should report an error.
